/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, constructed of brick, exhibit a traditional Chinese architectural style, adding a touch of historical charm to the scene. The trees, with their lush green foliage, provide a vibrant contrast to the brick structures. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in the light of the sun, which shines brightly in the center of the image, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
